backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister implementing access control, user profiles, config management placeholders, and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing required PNG dimension validation update for the Vite build script.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing concise summaries of various frontend source files and components.
frontend/dist/.ic-assets.json5: Asset configuration defining MIME types, cache policies, and SPA fallback rules for deployed frontend files.
frontend/dist/index.html: Built production HTML including SEO metadata, structured data, PWA settings, and links to generated assets.
frontend/index.html: Development index.html with full SEO metadata, PWA config, and root script loader for the React app.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: Domain configuration listing allowed Internet Computer domains for certificate validation.
frontend/public/manifest.json: Web app manifest defining app metadata, icons, shortcuts, theming, and PWA behavior.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing general crawling while blocking dashboard and internal routes, with sitemap and crawl delay.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Implements install, activate, and fetch handlers to cache static assets, images, and runtime requests using cache-first and network-first strategies.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Defines the site's sitemap with URLs, metadata, and multilingual alternate links for search engines.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the React router, global providers, and authenticated layout components for the application's main pages.
frontend/src/components/AlarmNotificatio: Displays a morning alarm modal with weather, energy data, sound playback, and voice updates.
frontend/src/components/AraChat.tsx: Provides a floating chat widget that logs user messages and returns random predefined assistant replies.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/AddAla: Dialog for creating a new alarm configuration, collecting alarm details and submitting via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/AddSys: Dialog component for adding a new energy system, handling form inputs, region detection, validation, and submission via API mutation.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Alarms: Displays and manages user alarms, allowing creation, editing, deletion, and toggling of alarm activation.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Analyt: Shows historical and predicted energy data with charts, domain status checks, and tools for downloading or copying deployment info.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/EditAl: Dialog for editing an existing alarm’s time and settings, updating it through an API mutation.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Energy: Renders a line chart visualizing energy consumption and temperature over time using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/EVAuth: Dialog for connecting a Ford or Rivian EV via a mock OAuth flow, saving OAuth config through a mutation.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Mainte: Renders a maintenance dashboard preview with mock system health data and utilities for status display. Includes refresh handling, status icons, and preview alerts pending backend integration.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/MyEVCa: Displays EV telemetry and controls for charging and disconnecting, with mock solar charging behavior. Shows battery, range, status, and interactive actions.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Overvi: Aggregates system configs and energy data to display stats, charts, and system statuses. Handles loading states and provides user-friendly summaries and insights.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Recomm: Fetches and filters AI energy recommendations and displays them with summaries and detail cards. Handles loading, empty states, and user language filtering.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/System: Manages connected systems and EV integrations, offering dialogs for adding systems and connecting or disconnecting EVs. Renders system statuses and EV cards.
Shows status cards for each system with latest energy and temperature data. Provides fallback when no systems are connected.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Temper: Displays temperature data in a bar chart with optional Celsius/Fahrenheit conversion. Maps energy data into a visual temperature gauge.
frontend/src/components/diagnostics/Smar: UI panel showing mock smart-diagnostics information with banners, empty-state results, and system explanation cards.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with attribution links to caffeine.ai and EcoPowerHub.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the top navigation bar with branding, theme toggle, user greeting, and logout functionality, plus mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/LoadingErrorBoun: Displays loading, timeout, and error states with retry handling and online/offline detection.
Renders the marketing site footer with brand info, social links, navigation shortcuts, and legal links.
Provides the marketing header with theme switching, region/language selectors, and responsive navigation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Interactive modal for collecting user name and language, saving the profile, and detecting timezone.
frontend/src/components/StableImage.tsx: Image component that prevents flickering by stabilizing dimensions and using a placeholder and fallback on errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, admin checks, and multiple mock system/config queries pending backend support.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base theme defining light/dark variables, global styles, and utilities like grid backgrounds and stable image handling.
frontend/src/lib/alarmService.ts: Utility functions for motivational messaging, alarm formatting, audio playback, and generating spoken morning energy updates.
frontend/src/lib/generatedAssetPaths.ts: Centralized mapping of generated PNG asset paths for logos, guides, AI interfaces, case studies, and technical images.
frontend/src/lib/i18n.ts: Defines supported languages, regions, device brands, system types, RTL detection, temperature utilities, timestamp formatting, and regional device mapping.
frontend/src/lib/weather.ts: Provides types and functions to fetch and parse weather data from Open‑Meteo and retrieve the user's geolocation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/BestPracticesPage.tsx: Renders a styled best‑practices guide with maintenance schedules and expandable sections.
frontend/src/pages/ComplianceSecurityPag: Displays compliance and security content with print‑optimized styles and a PDF export workflow.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the main dashboard UI with user profile data, admin shortcuts, and tabbed navigation across feature panels.
Checks accessibility of deployment domains, displays configuration status, and offers clipboard and status utilities.
frontend/src/pages/DeviceIntegrationGuid: Renders detailed setup, privacy, troubleshooting, and benefits guides for supported energy‑monitor devices using collapsible sections and asset-based illustrations.
frontend/src/pages/DiagnosticsPage.tsx: Provides electrical‑system reference data and documentation search with filtering plus a smart diagnostics panel for troubleshooting.
frontend/src/pages/DomainPortfolioPage.t: Displays mock domain portfolio data, availability, pricing, and brand‑strategy recommendations with calculated totals.
frontend/src/pages/EmailAutomationPage.t: Manages keyword‑based automated email responses with toggleable rules for common user issues and device integrations.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Serves a marketing landing page with hero section, global branding, CTA, and links to device setup guides.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page that triggers Internet Identity authentication and redirects authenticated users to the dashboard, with marketing feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/MarketingCampaignAsse: Generates and displays marketing assets including ad scripts and banner variants, with clipboard copy functionality.
frontend/src/pages/PartnerMarketplacePag: Shows affiliate programs with details like commissions, benefits, and signup links for energy-related partners.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Static privacy policy page outlining data collection, usage, security, and disclosure practices.
frontend/src/pages/SupportIntegrationsPa: Loads and displays support boundaries and manufacturer integrations with error handling and retry logic.
frontend/src/pages/TechSpecsPage.tsx: React page showing voltage compatibility, device specifications, SCADA protocol support, and compliance tables using UI components and query hooks.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for system configs, energy data, pricing models, SCADA support, EV telemetry, and related frontend data structures.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with extended colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
frontend/vite-build-verify.js: Node script verifying required image assets exist in dist/public generated folders and checking PNG dimensions during build.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, issues, required image assets, and architectural notes for restoring missing frontend visuals and asset handling.
unknown.txt: Empty or placeholder file with no content.
